name: Marie Curie
known_for: theory of radioactivity,  first woman Nobel Prize win

name: Katherine Johnson
known_for: orbital mechanics critical to sending first Americans into space

name: Gladys West
known_for: mathematical modeling of the shape of the Earth

name: Flossie Wong-Staal
known_for: first to clone HIV and map its genes, which led to test for virus

name: Jennifer Doudna
known_for: one of the primary developers of CRISPR
